name: Enchanted Vertical Slabs
description:
A simple, vanilla-like mod that adds Vertical Slabs to Minecraft.
New in v1.10: 
  - Added Stonecutter Recipes
  - Vertical Slabs are now centered in the inventory
  - Many bug fixes and improvements (see GitHub page for full list)

 New in v1.10.1: 
  - Even more bugfixes!

 New in v1.10.2: 
  - Look at that another bugfix!
